Title: Akane no Mai
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created for television by), Lisa Joy (created for television by), Dan Dietz, Gina Atwater (staff writer), Michael Crichton (based on the film written by)
Actors: Evan Rachel Wood, Thandie Newton, Jeffrey Wright, James Marsden
Plot: Maeve and her allies have revelations in a new world; Dolores makes a decision about Teddy; Karl discovers something sinister about the hosts.
